raw_text:
Based on the paper content, I'll extract the structured information about BRAC's CFPR program:

```json
{
  "paper_metadata": {
    "title": "Long-term effects of BRAC's Challenging the Frontiers of Poverty Reduction program",
    "matches_expected_title": "NO"
  },
  "program_information": {
    "program_name": "Challenging the Frontiers of Poverty Reduction: Targeting the Ultra-Poor (CFPR)",
    "country": "Bangladesh",
    "region": null,
    "target_population": "Ultra-poor households earning less than $0.60-$0.70 per day",
    "program_name_citation": "BRAC recognized that most interventions precluded the participation of the ultra-poor which led to the inception of the program Challenging the Frontiers of Poverty Reduction: Targeting the Ultra-Poor (CFPR) in 2002",
    "country_citation": "Despite having one of the poorest economies in the world, Bangladesh is acclaimed for its impressive progress in poverty reduction",
    "target_population_citation": "The ultra-poor are defined by BRAC to be the lower subset of the extremely poor, earning less than $0.60-$0.70 per day (BRAC, 2013)"
  },
  "intervention_components": {
    "component_a_cash_support": {
      "component_a_present": true,
      "cash_support_type": "food subsidy",
      "cash_amount": null,
      "cash_frequency": null,
      "is_loan_or_credit": "NO",
      "cash_evidence_citation": "The CFPR required the participants to enroll for a period of two years during which time they were provided a productive asset base, continuous and intensive training sessions, both in-class and hands on, on maintaining such assets, a food subsidy, education, and social and legal support"
    },
    "component_b_assets": {
      "component_b_present": true,
      "assets_provided": ["productive assets", "livestock"],
      "direct_provision": "YES",
      "assets_evidence_citation": "The CFPR required the participants to enroll for a period of two years during which time they were provided a productive asset base"
    }
  },
  "study_characteristics": {
    "outcomes_measured": [
      "income",
      "asset accumulation",
      "food security",
      "health",
      "employment",
      "social capital",
      "financial participation"
    ],
    "outcomes_evidence_citation": "Results show that outcomes that are directly affected through different program inputs such as the livestock, cash savings and financial market participation are positively affected in the short term",
    "study_design": "Quasi-experimental",
    "design_evidence_citation": "Most importantly, the selection of treated and control groups was not done in a randomized way, leaving the possibility for unobservable heterogeneity to violate the parallel trends assumption",
    "is_review_or_policy_analysis": false,
    "publication_year": null,
    "study_conducted_year": "2002-2011",
    "sample_size": 5626,
    "completed": true
  },
  "bonus_information": {
    "has_qualitative_components": true,
    "qualitative_methods": ["case studies"],
    "qualitative_evidence_citation": "Recent qualitative studies provide some insights for this shift. Case studies show that once the children are married, especially sons, the parents are likely to transfer most of their assets to them",
    "has_cost_data": false,
    "cost_mentions": null,
    "cost_evidence_citation": null
  }
}
```
